reviews.review: Игра неплохая, если играть с друзьями.)

So after playing a few years later, I've decided to change my review. The better parts of the community have gotten better, but the worst parts of the community have gotten even worse. The value and fun of the game you have depends solely on the people you play against. 

On top of that, Behavior Interactive has to be the most ignorant developer I've ever seen. While killers are struggling against discord-comm using, Rank 1 SWF groups due to the terrible, sub-par matchmaking, they decide the best thing for the game is to nerf Ruin, one of the best killer perks that already struggles due to bad totem spawn locations. 

It is my belief that at the current time of this review, Behavior cares more about maximizing profits from DLC than fixing their game.

Un buen juego que te mete tanto del lado de los asesinos  como de los sobrevivientes. Ademas contando de que los creadores tienen su forma de agregar personajes nuevos como tambien arreglar los bugs y por lo visto hasta ahora si cumplen.
Lo recomiendo si te gusta correr por tu vida como tambien buscar la vida de los otros.

Ótimo jogo, é como um pega-pega, porem com geradores, saidas e um assassino nem um pouco overpower atrás de você.

O jogo é muito bom pra ser jogado com os amigos, na verdade é a melhor forma de não passar stress. Quando for jogar com pessoas randomicas seja você o killer ou não, após cada partida dependendo do seu rank você terá novas mensagens no seu perfil de algum zé ninguém pistola porque você não o ajudou como sobrevivente ou porque você o matou jogando de assassino ?! Ironico, né?

O maior problema do jogo tirando alguns assassinos que são bem desbalaceados e OP é que o assassino é o host, portanto se ele quiser ligar o torrent, ou iniciar download na steam ou qualquer outra pra prejudicar a conexão dos sobreviventes e ele conseguir ganhar a partida ele pode, O "lag switch" é o que mata a beleza desse jogo.

Ainda rezo pra que um dia os lobbys sejam em servidores hospedados na nuvem para que a partida seja plena para todos os jogadores.
人类弱势版本 只玩人类的我选择退出。。。 不过还是希望黎明杀机一直好下去吧
this is one of those games that you have to learn before you even stand half a chance, but once you've got it down, it's great.
已经玩了429个小时了。但是对于这款游戏来说，依然属于入门萌新级别的。因为这款游戏的可玩性太强了。
Top

[h1]Game Summary[/h1]
Dead by Daylight is multiplayer survival Co-op game that has 4 players surviving against 1 other player that is the killer. The game has the 4 [b]survivors[/b] finish up generators to open up an exit gate for them to escape while the [b]killer[/b] has to kill them before they do so. [b]Survivors[/b] get to choose from a selection of characters that have their own perks that makes each of them have their own playstyle whether its to hide, run or finish generators. The [b]Killer[/b] also gets to choose from a selection of killers that have their own Active skill and perks that makes each of them unique.

TLDR:
[h1]Pros[/h1]
[list]
    [*]Unique multiplayer horror exeprience
    [*]Has layer of strategy and depth to gameplay
    [*]Super Fun with friends
    [*]Has unique characters to choose from either survivors or killers
[/list]

[h1]Cons[/h1]
[list]
    [*]Laggy lobby hosts
    [*]Fustrating random player behaviors
[/list]

[h1]The Good[/h1]
[b]Uniqueness[/b]
This is one of the 1st games that I have played in this multiplayer survival horror genre and I feel it manages to stand out in this genre. The way how they have made each [b]survivor[/b] and [b]killers[/b] have their own playstyle and skills makes it different from the other games out there as you are able to level up your characters through a skill web system which really shows character progression. 

[b]Layer of depth[/b]
I have never expected the depth in strategy or playstyle from a game like this to begin with as my initial impression of this game was just a simple cat and mouse game between [b]survivors[/b] and [b]killers[/b]. The varying skills and perks of each [b]survivor[/b] and [b]killers[/b] really help in this regard as it makes you think about a number of stuff like the [b]survivors[/b] have to find out which [b]killer[/b] it is as they have to play differently depending on the killer like the [i]Hillbilly[/i] can 1 shot [b]survivors[/b] with his chainsaw and can see other [b]survivors[/b] when he hooks someone or the [i]Nurse[/i] can blink distances and can see [b]survivors[/b] that are healing, etc. For [b]killers[/b] it is the same as there are [b]survivors[/b] that can dismantle your hooks that allow you to sacrifice [b]survivors[/b] for more points or some that can heal others quickly or another one that can escape your grasp when you carry them, etc.

[b]Fun Cooperative experience[/b]
Eventhough some [b]killers[/b] may say it is really annoying to fight against a  party of [b]survivor[/b] friends but 90% of playtime has been playing together with my friends and it was the most fun I had playing this game. The game is incredibly fun when you get to communicate with your friends through a voice channel as you are able to scream at them when a [b]killer[/b] chases you or even shout and laugh when they make mistakes. In this regard the cooperative horror experience was further enhanced for me and I 100% recommend playing this game with friends as you can even try really weird and fun builds with set of [b]survivors[/b] .

[h1]The Neutral[/h1]
[b]Connection[/b]
This isn't something the devs can control but the [b]killers[/b] are the host of the lobbies and I have found alot of [b]killers[/b] that have really bad pings which can make the game totally unenjoyable for me when they make you teleport back distances and get hit by them. 

[h1]The Bad[/h1]
[b]Bad Player behaviors[/b]
This may be more towards how players act and it won't be the game's fault but it was how the game is designed that made the player behave so. At times you may find [b]killers[/b] that will camp a single [b]survivor[/b] the whole game even if it means letting the other 3 live just to make sure they get a single kill and it can be argued that the [b]killer[/b] loses out in this regard but for me it ruins the overall experience of that single player that got camped. There are also certain cases of [b]survivors[/b] disconnecting instantly when they are downed once which really makes playing with random public [b]survivors[/b] even more annoying and fustarting when that happens. Overall this is the only bad thing I can find about the game and it really ruins my experience overall when these kind of player behaviors happen.

[h1]Summary[/h1]
If you have never tried this kind of games before and you would like to try this multiplayer survival horror genre, I would highly recommend this game to you and its a must buy on discount which it usually goes on discounts. I would also recommend to get it with freinds to make it a much more enjoyable experience when you play as survivors. With it's unique selection of characters it is really fun to play and try out each killer and survivor the game has to offer. I have not played too much on killers but from my 10% of my playtime I can say it is really use and master each killer's skills and playstyles but it can get a bit fustarting playing against good survivors.

This game just feels perfect. The devs are always looking for something new to add, and the community is always willing to take whatever they get. If the concept of a slasher film inspired game wasn't amazing enough, new content and patches are coming out left and right, with the community being one of the best i've seen in a game. Playing either survivor or killer is an absolute blast in this beauty of a game. 9/10

Game used to be good in 2017-early 2018.  That 8 months the devs have no fixed bugs or cheats.  The ignore bugs and complaints and just pray people forget about them and purchase new DLC every 12 weeks.  At its current state i can no recommend it to anyway.  Game crashes every 5-6 matches, 3 man lobbies are constant and solo queue is doable.

最终颜子轩放下夹子拿起了98k，锯皇一本也淡出了大家的视线现充，老虾米的视频再没更新，“土狗扁”也不会出现在拒绝的直播间里，上段机制从分数改成了徽章，护士也不再“代代虐人皇”，单排的抗刀怀表救人已成过去，最终用户协议也不意味着丢档，大家都不再带弹射，最初印象里连接国人玩家和zzz的Alex也离职了，凛妹登顶幻神之首，队友遛五台我讲相声的快乐紫段局也不会再有，列表里有的人肝帝等级永远停留在0，我也不再是那个十七八岁满脑子想着打游戏、甚至因为游戏里被人类嘲讽而掉眼泪的小姑娘了。

而游戏和现实都不等人。巨色和弹演的骚话一如既往，曾经的杀机情侣也都有了新的对象，贴吧每天都有新垃圾，新bug也花里胡哨层出不穷，玩“痛苦西流”梗的人仍然乐在其中，短期封禁系统也没能防止拔线。和不同的人玩游戏，列表的人来了又去，在其中或多或少交换了一些真心，然后在某个节点大家默契地不再说话，对话框慢慢沉底，想起那些快乐的夜晚都觉得有些恍惚。

去年也是这个时候吧，第一次写了dbd的评测，还挺多字。前段时间翻出来看觉得太陌生就删了，nah

我曾经也在dbd里储存好多快乐到飘飘然的幻想，后来才恍然，一场游戏一场梦。

É o famoso jogo "fácil de jogar mas difícil de dominar".

♣ Jogar em turma é o ápice da diversão, cada killer tem um jeito peculiar de aparecer e por vezes te assustar.
O jogo possui um sistema bastante empolgante relacionado à progressão, quanto mais você joga, mais vantagens você tem, além da sua skill ser mais aperfeiçoada.

A parte ruim é que as atualizações giram em torno de Killers novos, acompanhados de seus respectivos mapas e os killers são uma(s) DLC's à parte.

Dead By Daylight se destaca por seu jeito único de "pique esconde", se difere até aqui de todos os jogos próximos ao gênero.

Juego asimetrico 4v1 (1 asesinon vs 4 sobrevivientes)   

Como sobreviviente, repara 5 de 7 generadores en un mapa cerrado para abrir las puertas y escapar del asesino

Como asesino y sacrifica a los 4 sobrevivientes antes de  que escapen

Diversidada de asesinos, mapas y sobrevivientes! sumales cientos de perks y accesorios 

pros: actualizaciones consantes con nuevos mapas asesinos y sobrevivientes! adrenalina retos y diversion en cada rol

contras: Juego lleno de bugs, te desconecta al azar sin razon de por medio y te penalizan sin poder jugar por  por ello, la comunidad que suele ser toxica, con cada nuevo capitulo, suelen desbalancear el juego, toma un rato adaptarse°

recientemenete le agregaron un battlepass que es de los pocos que te regresan integro tu inversion al completarlo, aparte de darte skins y amuletos exclusivos

con el ultimo parche empeoraron las cosas, los hitboxes estan del asco  cade vez aumentan mas la cantidad de pallets en los mapas las nuevas animaciones de los personajes se ven ridiculas cambiaron la interfaz de juego, todo es un desastre

pero eso si en ves de arreglar los bugs siguen liberarndo contenido de pago
